MajorClaims.MC1: the capability of working independly is more significant
MajorClaims.MC2: the capablity of working alone is the foundation for the skill to work in team and plays a significant role in a lot of situations

Claims.C1: if you want to get brilliant achievements such as going to college, acing your school's final tests, you should consider learning to work on your own
Claims.C2: the ability to work alone will help you increase your ability to work with other people

Premises.P1: in many important cases when team-working is not possible, the ability to work alone will help
Premises.P2: effective cooperation can make things easier and faster
Premises.P3: The apperant example is that there are a lot of tests that do not allow team-working
Premises.P4: Let's imagine that you perform really well when you can discuss the problems with other people, but you have no experience of working alone, standardized tests such as SAT, TOEFL may be your nightmares
Premises.P5: Testing is a very important aspect of life, and still the majority of tests do not allow you to work in team
Premises.P6: Working in team does not mean that you do not have to come up with your ideas
Premises.P7: Everybody in a team must have his/her own opinion first, then discuss them with other members
Premises.P8: When we work in team, we still think individually
Premises.P9: our brain are not connected but separate
Premises.P10: When everyone in a team can come up with his/her own ideas, working in team will definitely more effective
